ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 7
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 7: With the team reduced to just Bane, Mister Freeze, and KGBeast, Jason sends them out to recruit new members so they can take on Bloom and his team. However, they only have a limited amount of Lazarus Resin left to power the team, leaving them no margin for error.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 18:02:18. [CVDB920642] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:48. [Issue ID 2398103]
